title: Tatsama Tadbhava
overview: Tatsama Tadbhava is a 2023 Indian Kannada-language suspense thriller film directed and written by Vishal Atreya and produced by Pannaga Bharana along with Spurti Anil and Chethan Nanjundaiah under PB Studios and Anvit Cinemas banner. The film stars Meghana Raj and Prajwal Devaraj in the lead roles.
